https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bPU5P5MLx5JcUHLuLEjGO0Cc8QW.jpg In Oxford, in a doorway to a house, a man lies dead. No suspects, no witnesses, no sign of forced entry. Like a real-life episode of Morse, Adrian Greenwood was an antique dealer stabbed over thirty times in his own home. The story may have the feel and look of a drama, but in reality somebodyâ€™s loved one has now been brutally murdered. Catching a Killer: The Wind in the Willows Murder
